attributes.review: He is a horrible guy and for him to be our president is absurd. I recommend not voting for him. It’s been four years and he is still using the make America great again slogan he hasn’t done anything so far. If you like the guy you are sick in the head maybe
attributes.title: This guy is a chump

attributes.review: I thought Gen Z was making jokes but when i opened the app my phone shut down for 10 days and all my electronics shut off too and my pets started to swallow my phone but i pulled it out of them and they was barking and hissing at me this is a cursed app!!!
attributes.title: Virus and very bad

attributes.review: I don’t even know where to start with this app. I downloaded this app because I wanted to support my amazing president as much as I can. But when I opened it my day just got ruined. My cat got horrible horrible diarrhea, my dog got RAN OVER. This app was just a very very bad experience.
attributes.title: Horrible app!!

attributes.review: as soon as I opened the app it called me fat and said if I didn’t vote for Trump they would come to my house and kick my dog. I can’t believe someone could say something so cruel. Not only that but this apps has a lot of bugs and I mean actual bugs like roaches!!!! I am in disbelief.
attributes.title: in disbelief

attributes.review: HORRIBLE APP!!😠 i downloaded this app to support my angel president but as soon as i opened the app it took me to pornhub🤬🤬 i was NOT expecting this AT ALL😒 i deleted the app immediately after, of course it WAS NOT my beloved presidents fault i still support him 100% because i am a white male 66 year old that watches fox news😌 TRUMP 2020🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈🏳️‍🌈 oops wrong flag😳

I cannot believe this app is still on the App Store after all the comotion it’s causing towards people of color , look down you’re talking to the most poeverful generation the world has seen , and people who are expressing their basic civil rights , disgusting , and very unsatisfied.
attributes.title: Very disrespectful

attributes.review:
I downloaded this app thinking it was a joke, found out Republicans actually want to vote for him? Total surprise. If I were them, I would
Keep that to myself, embarrassing! I can tell you I’ve taken larger dumps that resemble this app to a T so why take up storage? 0/10
attributes.title: Worst app ever!

attributes.review: All I wanted to do was see what this Oompa Loompa was planning and now I have come to realize that this doesn’t tell me that. This app is BS and completely useless. The least it could’ve done was asked me how my day was, but instead I just saw this carrot/corn bunker baby on my screen! I’m disgusted!
attributes.title: TERRIBLE

attributes.review: Idk about this man I was about to download it when it was being downloaded my dad grandpa and ex dog all died in the car crash with my cat driving I just don’t think it’s safe I stoped the download and they all came back to life .I mean download it if u want but would NOT recommend
attributes.title: Review

attributes.review: I’m definitely a hardcore republican, ✌️this app is so confusing 😔 trump definitely has something wrong with his head 👻 I’m definitely voting trump for president but this is not the move 👉 the features are horrible my own mother couldn’t even learn how to use it 😾 I’m so sad 😞sadness 🤕
attributes.title: Horrible App
